author: Lozza
title: Lozza
text:
We didn't get the bracket we selected (up to 75" TV) and the one we got didn't have the correct amount of holes...PLUS the part that fixes to your TV was too small for the part that connects to the wall.... SO it could not even be used as supplied... Further to that there is no writing whatsoever on the instructions and very unhelpful pictures.... about 1000 times more complicated then say.... and Ikea piece...We wanted to write to them and complain but they hardly speak English so what would be the point.... they won't change.
Save yourself the hassle and pay the extra for a really good brand (we paid over $100 for this POS....).
